workshop.title: Oracle Day by Day & Oracle Synopsis Workshop
workshop.description: These labs discuss the features of Mobile Apps in the space of Oracle Analytics Cloud, a use case around Sales Organisation with real business challenges.

labs.title: Introduction
labs.description: Obtain an Oracle Cloud Trial Account

labs.title: Lab 100: Getting Started with OAC
labs.description: Learning how to provision an OAC instance

labs.title: Lab 200: Analyzing Sales Pipeline - Explore Oracle Day by Day
labs.description: Upload Sales Pipeline Data Set and create Index. Explore the capabilities of Oracle Day by Day

labs.title: Lab 300: Analyzing Sales Opprotunities - Explore Synopsis
labs.description: Access Sales Opprotunity Data Set from email. Explore the capabilities of Oracle Synopsis
